artwork:
; The data that follows is ADMIN CMD data. ADMIN_CMD = %x00:31
; The data that follows is AUTH CMD data. AUTH_CMD = %x01:31
; The data that follows is FILE or FOLDER CMD data. FILE_CMD = %x02:31
; The data that follows is Phoenix PROTO CMD ; specific command data. PROTO_CMD = %x03:31
; Define a SEQ (sequence) type. SEQ = uint32_t
; Any command. A 32-bit value. CMD = (VENDOR_BIT / PHOENIX_BIT) (ADMIN_CMD / AUTH_CMD / FILE_CMD / PROTO_CMD)
; Define a CmdPayload (blob of data) type. ; The length of CmdPayload is determined by the CMD. CmdPayload = *uint8_t
; A Phoenix packet PacketBody = SEQ CMD (AdminPayload / AdminReplyPayload / AuthPayload / AuthReplyPayload / FilePayload / FileReplyPayload / ProtoPayload / ProtoReplyPayload)
